Arc node topology for simple features.

Arc node topology for simple features.

# S3 method for sf
sc_node(x, ...)

Arguments

x
input simple features object
...
arguments for methods

Examples

x <- sf::st_read(system.file("extdata/file.geojson", package= "sc"))
#> Reading layer `OGRGeoJSON' from data source `C:\Users\mdsumner\Documents\R\win-library\3.3\sc\extdata\file.geojson' using driver `GeoJSON'
#> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 1 field
#> geometry type:  MULTIPOLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 0 ymin: 0 xmax: 1.23 ymax: 1
#> epsg (SRID):    4326
#> proj4string:    +proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs
#sc_node(x)  ## get the nodes
## now get the arcs (should the functions be called arc() and node()?)
